comments:
Description:
Cross table contain filter cannot export to library[01]

Step:
1.New datasource, dataset and data cube
2.Insert a cross table and binding the data cube
3.Drop the measure and dimension into cross table
4.Add a filter on cross table
5.Export the report to library
